name: Escape From Prototype
description:
Escape From Prototype is a game developed for the Global Game Jam 2022 themed "Duality".

Take control of 2 Prototype Characters on their quest to escape their Prototype world and explore the unknown. One does exactly what you tell them, while the other does the complete opposite. They must work together and solve puzzles and obstacles in order to Escape.

Voice over provided by Aika Intong.

You can find all music used for the game on this link.
